channel.title: NewGlory 317 [24/7 server whit great community] Check it Out!
channel.description:
[center]
Desktop Client Link: New LINK :eek: http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?2uia0hda3dr14e8 This server is now hamachi server(when donations are over 50$ we will make no hamachi server! :)
Webclient link http://newgloryforum.webs.com/webclient-desktop-client (there is 3 different webclient links so you need to test which one is online(becouse 3 runner :/))
Forums link http://newgloryforum.webs.com/
Find us on facebook https://www.facebook.com/pages/Newglory/178742425624586?fref=ts
Download hamachi here: http://hamachi.fi.softonic.com/
Network Name: NewGlory 1, NewGlory 2, NewGlory 3, NewGlory 4, pass: 1234
NewGlory is 317 client loading 508 whit new items Owner is Glory
Vote and donate for my server
Updates:
-HighScores -Every prayer is working -veng working -::yell command -many bosses -Minigames -Barrowns now on the ground -2 quest -Custom items and more coming -All 24 skills are working -Custom dungeoneering -Donator zone -Staff zone -Overloads are working -Great Economy -Great Pking system 100% working -Many shops -100% working Duel Arena -Staking, Dice working -100% Lootshare and coinshare -100% Working clan chat -Random ep loots -Vote working - donate working - rules - ::reset stats command is working - flower game - great community - best staff team - new frames - Forums now active
Images coming soon(you can check the website)!
